>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.4wAicxCXZcPLSOVY]{Immortal Tutor (Su)}

You’ve learned technological exploits from evil outsiders.

Spell: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.rJ0acpj21GDJYaim]{Summon Creature} (daemon, demon, and devil only) 

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.IokVsUJIP4epBFMG]{First Lesson}: You gain DR/good with a value equal to 1-1/2 × the spell’s level (rounded down).

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.RWdUBIz1T8GgGYDA]{Second Lesson}: Your armor briefly grows spikes, dealing piercing damage equal to your technomancer level plus your Intelligence modifier to a creature that damaged you with a melee attack.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LKFnD7ihZgdYqHSB]{Third Lesson}: You gain fire resistance 10. After you resolve the spell that triggers the first lesson, any enemies within 30 feet who can see you must succeed at a Will save or become shaken for 1d6 rounds (DC = 20 + your Intelligence modifier).

Edit spell in the Details tab.

Spell Preperation should be set to Always Available. And Limited uses set to 1 of 1 /-Day.

Be sure to update the Spell level as you gain access to higher level spells.
